p: This study lists 127 Karen medicinal species used for treatments of infectious diseases, but only a few of them were used for many different types of infection and several were used only for a single infection type ( Table 1). Although these species had low CI values, other studies have shown that some of them have antimicrobial activities, such as Acmella oleracea [ 42], Euphorbia heterophylla [ 43], Peperomia pellucida [ 44], and some other species listed in Table 1.
